name: ALCConnectPlus
0:
”Alexa, ask Control Hub to arm away”
”Alexa, ask Control Hub to disarm”
”Alexa, ask Control Hub to start group one”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: control hub
Developer Terms of Use
des:
ALC Connect Plus System offers a remote control and surveillance for your household. 
View live streaming videos and record videos for later viewing. Monitor energy usage and control
devices such as Power Switch , PIR Motion Detection , Door Contact.

ALC Connect Plus System :
- Home security.
- Support Arm and Disarm. 
- Group(Hotkey). 
- Camera Recording . 
- Start Siren.
 
You can use ALC Connect Plus skill to control ALC Connect Plus System related products.

WHAT CAN I SAY?
"Alexa, ask Control Hub to arm."
"Alexa, ask Control Hub to disarm."
"Alexa, ask Control Hub to panic."
"Alexa, ask Control Hub to part arm."
"Alexa, ask Control Hub to start group one."
"Alexa, ask Control Hub to start recording."
